column2: teeny demerit - I went for their Monday steak special and they were out.  Although
column3: by the time I looked at the menu
column4: I wasn't feeling steak so I am not heartbroken over that.  To be fair to them
column5: steak was not on the regular menu
column6: so I am sure they only order what they need
column7: and I showed up at 9:00.  (They did offer a discount to anyone who ordered the steak special
column8: which I think is WAY above and beyond).
